source:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_00Alpa needs your help with the latest additions to Castellum Velodyna.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
カステッルム・ベロジナのアルパは、冒険者に伝えたいことがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_01The area around the castellum is home to many dangerous creatures. To give travelers somewhere to stay at night, J'olhmyn had proposed converting unused storerooms into lodgings. She suggests speaking with someone who has actually slept in one of the newly prepared rooms to find out if anything needs to be improved.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

アルパと話した。国境を通る民間人のために、空いている倉庫を簡易宿泊所として開放したという。とはいえ、寝台を置いただけの質素なものに過ぎず、より良くしていくために、実際に利用した者の意見が聞きたいようだ。ギラバニア辺境地帯のカステッルム・ベロジナ周辺で、昨晩の客であるという、「グリダニアの旅商」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_02<tab>Although the merchant is grateful to have had somewhere to stay, he did not enjoy a good night's sleep. Bedding from Vira Nilya had been provided, but he did not know what to do with it and slept on the floor instead. When Alpa demonstrates the correct method of using the bedding by curling into a coil, it becomes clear that she has no knowledge whatsoever of the needs of their two-legged guests. While J'olhmyn accepts responsibility for Alpa's lack of preparedness, she admits to being far from an expert on inns herself. She recommends looking around Ala Ghiri for those with experience in the field of accommodation to work as an advisor.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_02<tab>グリダニアの旅商と話した。アルパの用意した寝台は、とてもヒトが利用できるものではなく、まずは宿とはどういうものかを教える必要があるようだ。ギラバニア山岳地帯の「アラギリ」で、アドバイザーになってくれる人物を探そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_03<tab>Upon arriving in Ala Ghiri, it soon becomes clear that the residents are busy restoring their village since its liberation from imperial rule. Although no one there has the time to go to Castellum Velodyna and act as advisor, you learn of a man called Gales who once worked as an innkeeper in Goodblade before it was razed. Alpa is carrying out her own inquiries and would be glad to hear this promising information.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_03<tab>アラギリの人々と話した。アラギリの「アルパ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_04<tab>Alpa is pleased by the news of there being a candidate for the role of advisor. She and J'olhmyn proceed to Goodblade, where Gales is said to be wandering aimlessly.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_04<tab>アルパと話した。隊商宿グッドブレード跡の「ゲイルス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_05<tab>Gales has hit upon hard times since the fall of Goodblade. He seems convinced that he is no longer of use to anyone, but Alpa persuades him to aid in her cause. Despite being hesitant at first, he accepts the offer and travels with her to the castellum.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_05<tab>ゲイルスと話した。アドバイザーの仕事に興味を持ったようだ。カステッルム・ベロジナの「ゲイルス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_06<tab>Upon seeing the shoddy state of the castellum's sleeping quarters, Gales unexpectedly flies into a rage. Unperturbed by this sudden outburst, Alpa is filled with renewed enthusiasm and vows to do her utmost to carry out Gales's orders. His first instructions are to gather raw materials for building beds and a chocobo stable, which can be found in the wreckage of a nearby imperial base, according to J'olhmyn. She advises you to ride a marid and use its powerful forelegs to smash the scrap metal into pieces small enough to carry. Luckily, Dakshina the Gatekeepers' resident marid trainer has one ready and waiting.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_06<tab>ゲイルスと話した。アルパたちの造った簡易宿泊所には、何もかもが不足しているという。カステッルム・ベロジナの「ダクシャナ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_07<tab>Climbing atop the marid, you head for what remains of Castellum Corvi. The enormous beast should make short work of crushing the scrap left strewn about the area.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_07<tab>ダクシャナと話した。マーリドに騎乗した状態でカステッルム・コルヴィに向かい、「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA8C101 /var>」に「踏みつけ」を行おう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_08<tab>Now that you and the marid have finished your work, the Gatekeepers can carry the raw materials back to Castellum Velodyna. Gales and the others eagerly await your return.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_08<tab>マーリドの踏みつけで小さく砕いた鉄材は、国境警備隊の隊士が運んでくれるようだ。カステッルム・ベロジナの「ゲイルス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_09<tab>Thanks to Gales's cooperation, the castellum's guest rooms and chocobo stable are finally complete. His tutelage has given Alpa a deeper understanding of the travelers and their needs, while Gales realizes that he still has much to learn about the Ananta. Having overcome numerous hurdles, Alpa moves ever closer to bringing her plans for Velodyna to fruition.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SEQ_09<tab>ゲイルスの協力により、簡易宿泊所が一新された。一度は寝台造りに失敗したアルパだったが、ヒトへの理解を深めたことで、使い心地の良い寝台造りに成功したようだ。カステッルム・ベロジナがより良い関所となるよう、引き続き、アルパに協力していこう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Gridanian merchant.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_00<tab>グリダニアの旅商と話す

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_01<tab>Search for potential advisors in Ala Ghiri.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_01アラギリで
アドバイザーとなってくれる人物を探す

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_02<tab>Report to Alpa.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_02<tab>アルパに報告

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Gales in Goodblade.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_03<tab>隊商宿グッドブレード跡のゲイルスと話す

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Gales in Castellum Velodyna.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_04<tab>カステッルム・ベロジナのゲイルスと話す

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Dakshina.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_05<tab>ダクシャナと話す

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_06<tab>Use the marid's Trample ability on the warmachina wreckage in Castellum Corvi.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_06マーリドに騎乗して
カステッルム・コルヴィのに踏みつけを使う

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Gales in Castellum Velodyna.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_TODO_07<tab>カステッルム・ベロジナのゲイルスと話す

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “The First of Many.”
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_100_001本クエストを進行するためには、
「メインクエスト：紅蓮のリベレーター」の、
「いざ山岳地帯へ」を完了する必要があります。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_100_001<tab>Good to sssee you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You know, I'd say our work is progresssing quite nicely. There's still time left, but even if Mother were to arrive tomorrow, I think she'd be impresssed!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_100_001しゅ～……おお、おぬしか。
どうじゃ、ここも少しは関所らしくなってきたじゃろう？
まだ期間は残されておるが、これなら母上が視察に来ても大丈夫……

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_001<tab>Isn't it a bit early to be saying that?
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_001<tab>な、わけないよねぇ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_150_001<tab>The work needs to be finished before she comes back. We'd have a hard time convincing your mother with the place as it is now.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_150_001アンタの母上が出した条件は、
この橋を、辺境地帯を守るに相応しい関所へと変えること。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_200_001<tab>Of course, the castellum is no longer under threat of demolition, and the griffin statues are very nice. But it's still more or less the same as when we arrived.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_200_001グリフィン像を建てたことで、橋を取り壊せと騒ぐ連中は消えたが、
まだ関所に必要な設備が整ったわけじゃない。
こんな状態で、母上に認めてもらえるわけがないだろ？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_200_001<tab>What about the old ssstorerooms we converted into overnight lodgings?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_200_001しゅぅ～……じゃから、帝国軍が倉庫として使っていた建物を、
簡易宿泊所として開放したではないかぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_300_001<tab>Yes, I was just getting to that. As you doubtless know from personal experience, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, this whole area is crawling with dangerous creatures, many of which are more active at night.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_300_001うん、オレの提案でね。
この辺りには獰猛な魔物が多い。
冒険者ならばともかく、一般人が夜に通るにはあまりに危険だし。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_400_001<tab>Adventurers and soldiers can hold their own against them, but merchants and returning refugees are easy targets. We'll be seeing a lot more of them now that the Garleans have withdrawn.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_400_001特に近頃は、故郷へ帰らんと旅をするアラミゴ難民や、
物資を運ぶ隊商など、民間人の往来が増えてきてるからね。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_001<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_002<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_003<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_003<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_004<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_004<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_005<tab>That's why I suggested that we put down some beds in the old storerooms. I haven't actually had a look yet, but I'm sure Alpa took care of it. There are probably a few things that need improving, though.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_005そこで、アルパに簡易宿泊所を用意させたのさ。
実物はまだ見ていないんだが、寝台くらいなら、
用意するのも簡単だろうと思ってね。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_005<tab>If we ask someone who's actually spent the night here, we can get their opinion.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_005ってことで、実際に泊まった利用者から話を聞きながら、
少しずつ改善していこうじゃないか。
アルパの仕事ぶりの確認も含めてさ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_006<tab>That visitor from Gridania who ssslept here should still be about. Why don't we ssstart with him?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_006しゅ～……ならば、早速話を聞きに行こうではないか！
昨夜の客、「グリダニアの旅商」はまだ近くにおるはずじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_000_010<tab>Can I help you?
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_000_010<tab>おや、私に何か用でも？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_011<tab>Having stayed overnight in our lodgings, would you say you ssslept well?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_011しゅ～……
旅の商人よ、簡易宿泊所で過ごした夜はどうであった？
今後の利便性向上のため、忌憚のない意見を聞かせてほしいのじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_000_012<tab>I wasn't expecting to find anywhere to stay and I was full glad to be offered shelter. Otherwise, I'd have been traveling in the dark with only the beasts breathing down my neck to keep me warm!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_000_012ああ、隊長さん、どうも。
こんな所に宿泊所があるとは思ってなかったから、助かったよ。
危うく、夜通し歩くところだった。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_000_013<tab>Having said that, I think it's a bit soon to be calling them “lodgings.” I would've appreciated something to lie on besides the floor.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_000_013ただ……ここが宿屋ではないことは承知しているが……
せめて、寝台で寝ることができれば、より疲れもとれただろう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_014<tab>The floor? I heard that travelers preferred to sssleep in proper beds so I had some brought over from Vira Nilya.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_014しゅ～……何を言う、寝台は用意しておいたはずじゃぞ。
わらわたち解放軍とは違い、野営に慣れていない者は、
硬い床で寝ることで、かえって体を痛めてしまうと聞いていたゆえ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_000_015<tab>A bed? I didn't see anything like that.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_000_015<tab>え～？　それらしいものはなかったけどなぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_015<tab>Alpa? You did give them something to sleep on, didn't you?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_015おいおい、どうなってんだい、アルパ。
オレは、アンタが大丈夫って言うから任せたんだよ？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_016<tab>Of course I did! Maybe it would be quicker if I just showed you. Wait here.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_016<tab>しゅ～……論より証拠じゃ、ちと待っておれ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_017<tab>You had one of these in your room, didn't you?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_017しゅ～……ほれ、見ろ！
これと同じ物が、おぬしの泊まった部屋にも置いてあったじゃろう？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_000_018<tab>I did. Do you mean to say I'm supposed to sleep on <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_000_018ああ、あったよ。
だけど、本当にこれが寝台なのか……？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_019<tab>Allow me to demonstrate.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_019<tab>しゅ～……ちと待っておれ、わらわが使い方を実践してみせよう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_100_019<tab>That's it! Put it down over here!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_100_019よし、ここでよいぞ！
寝台を下ろしてくれ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_BORDERGUARDCORPS03038_200_019<tab>Yes, Captain!
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_BORDERGUARDCORPS03038_200_019<tab>了解であります！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_300_019<tab>Sssee?
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_300_019<tab>しゅ～……どうじゃ！！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_020<tab>This is how we Ananta go to sssleep─ We just coil up like this and we're perfectly comfortable.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_020わらわたちアナンタは、
こうして、己の身体をとぐろのように巻いて寝るのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_021<tab>You scaly-pated imbecile! Do you think we can “just coil up” like that? Get up, would you?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_021とぐろなんて巻けるかい！
今すぐ棄ててきな！！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_022<tab><sigh> Fine...
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_022<tab>しゅ～……はい……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_BORDERGUARDCORPS03038_200_022<tab>We'll help you, Captain Alpa!
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_BORDERGUARDCORPS03038_200_022<tab>アルパ隊長、失礼します！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_100_022<tab>And on that note, I bid you all farewell.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_MERCHANT03038_100_022<tab>……そ、そそそそれじゃ、僕はもう行くよ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_200_022<tab>It's partly my fault, I suppose. I should've made sure that Alpa knew what a guest room actually <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> first.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_200_022どうやら、オレは順番を間違えたみたいだ。
アルパに簡易宿泊所を造らせる前に、
宿とはどういうものなのか理解させるべきだったよ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_023<tab>To be honest, it's been a while since I stayed in a decent inn myself, so I'm probably not in any position to give proper advice. Any thoughts?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_023さっきはああ言ったが、オレも解放軍に入ってからは野営ばかりで、
偉そうに説教できるほど、宿に詳しいわけじゃない。
さて、)) (( )) 02 /var>、どうすればいいかねぇ？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_A1_000_001<tab>We could head to a village with one and ask around?
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_A1_000_001<tab>他の宿泊施設を参考にすべき

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_A1_000_002<tab>Nothing builds character like a cold, hard floor, I say.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_A1_000_002<tab>わからない

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_025<tab>I doubt our guestsss will be in the mood for any character-building after a long journey. Any other ideas?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_025しゅ～……まいったのう……。
頼みの綱は、おぬししかおらぬというのに……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_025<tab>Come to think of it, there are several inns for travelers in Ala Ghiri.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_025……そういえば、ギラバニア山岳地帯に、
アラギリという大きな宿場街があるね。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_026<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_026<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_027<tab>Good idea. We might find sssomeone who can come here to tell us what this place is misssing.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_027しゅ～……なるほどのう！
そこで働く者ならば、わらわたちの簡易宿泊所に足りぬ物が何か、
容易く見抜いてくれるであろう！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_028<tab>Let's head to the inns in Ala Ghiri.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_028そうと決まれば「アラギリ」で、
アドバイザーになってくれる人を探そうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_030<tab>I think I sssaw that merchant a few moments ago. He can't have gone far.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_030しゅ～……こやつが「グリダニアの旅商」じゃ。
さっそく、簡易宿泊所の感想を聞いてみようぞ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_035<tab>You think we should ask him? No, not a good idea. Merchants tend to be a bit wary of us military types.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_035アンタから声をかけてくれないか？
軍人に呼び止められるより、冒険者からの方が、
角が立たないってモンだろう？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_WEIDHERI_000_040<tab>Advice on accommodation? Sorry, I'm needed here for the time being. Might be worth asking around though.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_WEIDHERI_000_040あんたたちの造る宿泊施設のアドバイザーになってくれって？
悪いが、今はここを離れられなくてなぁ……。
他を当たってくれるか？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JNAIROH_000_041<tab>You want me to go all the way to Castellum Velodyna? I'd love to help, but I've got my hands full here as it is.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JNAIROH_000_041へえ、あなたたち、宿を開こうとしているの？
力になってあげたいのは山々だけれど、
私も仕事が溜まっててね……ごめんなさい。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GERBOD_000_042<tab>Lodgings, you say? You ought to try askin' people who used to work in Goodblade. 'Course, it's naught more than rubble now, so the old residents are lookin' to apply their trades elsewhere.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GERBOD_000_042宿場のノウハウを教えてくれる者を探してるって？
なら、かつて隊商宿グッドブレードで働いていた者を当たるといい。
あの宿は壊されちまったが、元の商売に戻りたい者もいるはずだ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GERBOD_000_043<tab>A bloke called Gales used to run an inn there and he took pride in his work. You should find him still mopin' around there.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GERBOD_000_043特にゲイルスという男は、今でも宿場の仕事に未練があるのか、
隊商宿グッドブレード跡でぼんやりしているところを見かけるよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_045<tab>How goes the sssearch? I'm not having much luck.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_045しゅ～……そこをなんとかならぬか！
わらわたちが造った簡易宿泊所を、
ひと目見るだけでも……どうか！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_050<tab>It turns out that everyone's busy trying to get Ala Ghiri back on its feet. They might have some useful information, though. Let's keep trying.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_050ここの連中は、誰も彼も忙しそうにしてるねぇ。
オレたちを手伝う暇なんてあるようには思えないよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_055<tab>They can't <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> be busy, can they?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_055しゅ～……この街の住人は、誰も彼も忙しそうにしておって、
未だアドバイザーを引き受けてくれる者は見つからぬ……
じゃが、わらわは諦めたりはせぬぞ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_100_055<tab>Did you find anyone?
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_100_055<tab>そちらはどうじゃ、何か収穫はあったか？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_056<tab>A man named Gales? And he was an innkeeper? Perfect! Let's go and look for him!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_056ほほう、「ゲイルス」なる者は、隊商宿で働いておったのか。
ならば、アドバイザーとしてはこれ以上ない人材じゃな！
よし、早速会いに行くのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_WEIDHERI_000_057<tab>Actually, I could use a hand here if you're free!
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_WEIDHERI_000_057<tab>アドバイザー、見つかるといいな。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JNAIROH_000_058<tab>Sorry I couldn't be more helpful.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JNAIROH_000_058力になってあげたいのは山々だけれど、
私も仕事が溜まっててね……ごめんなさい。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GERBOD_000_059<tab>If you're heading over to Goodblade, watch your backs. There's all sorts of horrible things lurkin' about.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GERBOD_000_059ゲイルスは、今でも宿場の仕事に未練があるのか、
隊商宿グッドブレード跡でぼんやりしているところを見かけるよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_060<tab>What brings you to Goodblade? Or rather, what's left of it...
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_060<tab>確かに僕がゲイルスですが……何かご用ですか？
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_Q2_000_000<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_A2_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_A2_000_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_062<tab>Oh, I see. You say my advice may prove beneficial? It's very kind of you to ask, but I should warn you─failure seems to follow me everywhere I go...
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_062あなた方の造った簡易宿泊所を改善するための、
アドバイザーになってほしい……ですって？
……でも、嫌われ者の僕なんて雇ったところで……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_063<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_063<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_063<tab>He's a ray of sunshine, isn't he?
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_063<tab>うわぁ、陰気なヤツだねぇ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_100_063<tab>Since the fall of Goodblade, I've tried working elsewhere. It never seems to last long because everyone takes such a disliking to me. I can't say I blame them. I'm no good to anyone.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_100_063隊商宿が壊されてから、ほかのところで働いたことがありますが、
いつもみんなに嫌われて、追い出されてしまうんです。
きっと、僕がこんなにウジウジしているから……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_064<tab>But we heard you were a first-rate innkeeper! You should put that experience to good use by helping usss!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_064しゅ～……じゃが、ゲイルスよ、
宿場の仕事に未練があるのではないか？
ならば、おぬしの才、我が国境警備隊で活かしてみよ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_065<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_065<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_066<tab><sigh> If you say so. I'm just worried that I'll go all the way to the castellum only for you to change your minds and turn me away. It would be just my luck...
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_066ぐふふふふふ……わかりました。
ですが、今すぐに、この暗い性格を変えることはできません。
後になって、やっぱりなし、というのは嫌ですよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_067<tab>We wouldn't do that. We need you! Let's head for the cassstellum. I'll explain more on the way.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_067しゅ～……無論じゃ、おぬしには期待しておるからのう！
よし、「ゲイルス」よ、「カステッルム・ベロジナ」へ戻り、
わらわたちの造った簡易宿泊所を見てくれ、なのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_068<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_068<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_070<tab>Is that Gales?
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_070<tab>しゅ～……こやつが「ゲイルス」とやらか？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_075<tab>Hopefully he'll be just what we're looking for!
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_075<tab>引き受けてくれるといいけどねぇ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_WEIDHERI_000_080<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_WEIDHERI_000_080<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JNAIROH_000_081<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JNAIROH_000_081<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GERBOD_000_082<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GERBOD_000_082<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_090<tab>Oi! You scrawny little turd! Are these supposed to be guest rooms!? It's an insult!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_090コラァ、蛇女ァ！！
ここには、簡易宿泊所に必要なモンが何もねえじゃねえかァ！
てめえ、仕事ナメてんのかァ！？　オオーン！？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_091<tab>Is sssomething amiss, Gales?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_091しゅしゅ！？
ゲイルスに何が起こったのじゃ！？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_092<tab>You're bloody right something's amiss! Why would anyone torture themselves by sleeping in this shitehole? That bed's not fit for a chocobo! And that's another thing─ Where are the chocobos meant to stay?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_092宿ってのぁ、旅の疲れを癒やす場所だろがいィ……！！！
ここには、赤子のほっぺたみてえに柔らけぇ寝台もなければ、
お客様のチョコボを休ませる設備すらねえじゃねえかァ！！！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_092<tab>So this is why he has trouble keeping a job...
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_092も、もしや……これが……
ゲイルスが今日まで仕事にありつけなかった理由かい……？
宿への情熱が、空回りしすぎて火を噴いたって感じだねぇ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_093<tab>All right, Gales, I hear you loud and clear! I'll do whatever it takes to turn this place around!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_093しゅ～……ならば、寝台はわらわに造らせてくれ！
次こそは、上手くやってみせるのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_094<tab>You know bugger all about how to treat guests, but you've got the right attitude! Let's get to work!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_094オウオウオウ、威勢だけはいいじゃねえかァ！
よっしゃァ！　てめぇの覚悟、このオレが見届けてやらァ！！！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_095<tab>Like I was saying, there's nothing for chocobos at all, so we'll start with that. We need a stable and troughs for food and water. Oi! You over there! Is there any wood or metal we can use?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_095そんならオレは、チョコボ留を造るとすっかァ！
ちょっとした屋根と寝床、飼い葉桶に水桶あたりを用意しねえとなァ！
猫娘、材料はあるか？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_096<tab>Not really, no. I know a few places we might be able to get some, though.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_096それだけの物を揃えるには、
木材と鉄材の備蓄が心許ないかもねぇ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_096<tab>I'll arrange to have some timber collected. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, there should be some piles of scrap metal over at Castellum Corvi.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_096仕方ない、木材はオレが集めてくるよ。
)) (( )) 02 /var>は、カステッルム・コルヴィで、
「」を手に入れてきてくれないかい？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_097<tab>Don't worry─I'm not expecting you to lug it back here by yourself. The other Gatekeepers can take care of that. I just need you to prepare it for transport.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_097ひとりで運ぶのはしんどいだろうから、
国境警備隊の部下たちにも、手伝わせるとしよう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_098<tab>We should have a marid crush it underfoot to break it into smaller pieces. If you speak with Dakshina, she should be able to get one ready. She's just outside the gate.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_098それと、アナンタ族が飼育しているマーリドを使いな。
硬く大きな鉄材も、持ち運べる大きさに砕くことができるはずさ。
乗り方は、関所の外にいる「ダクシャナ」に教えてもらうといい。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_100<tab>Gales is looking things over as we ssspeak. I was about to ask his opinion, but he seems a bit...different from before.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_100しゅ～……今の簡易宿泊所の状況を、ゲイルスに見てもらったぞ。
これから、評価を聞かせてもらうところじゃが……
どうにも、様子がおかしくてのう……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_105<tab>It's hard to picture anyone being satisfied with Alpa's lodgings, never mind a professional.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_105<tab>アルパの造った簡易宿泊所を見て、ゲイルスはどう思ったかねえ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_DAKSHINA_000_106<tab>We Ananta have lived alongssside marids for generations. Do not fear. Their enormousss size belies their gentle nature.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_DAKSHINA_000_106シュー……マーリドは、古くからアナンタと関わりのある獣でな。
図体はでかいが、とても心の優しい獣だ。
怖がることはないぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_DAKSHINA_000_110<tab>You wish to ride the marid? For what purpossse?
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_DAKSHINA_000_110<tab>シュー……マーリドに乗りたいのか？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_DAKSHINA_000_111<tab>I sssee...crushing a few sssteel plates should pose no difficulty for a marid. They are even ssstronger than they look.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_DAKSHINA_000_111なるほど、「カステッルム・コルヴィ」周辺で資材集めをしたいと。
それなら、こいつの「踏みつけ」が役に立つ。
どんなに硬くて太い鉄板も、細かく踏み潰してくれる。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_DAKSHINA_000_112<tab>Should you be ssseparated from the marid, it will return to me of its own volition. Once the work is complete, you may disssmount as you please.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_DAKSHINA_000_112乗り手を失ったマーリドは、ここへと戻るよう教育してある。
作業を終えたら、降りてしまっても構わないぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_115<tab>Even a tamed marid can be dangerous if startled, so don't make any sudden moves or loud noises!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_115アナンタ族が飼育しているマーリドを連れて行けば、
硬く大きな鉄材も、持ち運べる大きさに砕くことができるはずさ。
乗り方は、「ダクシャナ」に教えてもらうといい。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_100_115<tab>Once we're finished, you'll hardly recognize the place!
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_100_115<tab>しゅ～……次こそは上手くやってみせるのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_200_115<tab>Now I'm really fired up!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_200_115オラオラオラオラァ！！
漢（おとこ）ゲイルス、ここを死地と決める覚悟でやってやらァ！！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIER03038_000_120<tab>What strength! I wouldn't want to get on a marid's bad side, that's for sure.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIER03038_000_120ヒュゥ～！
相変わらず、すげえ破壊力だぜ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIER03038_000_121<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIER03038_000_121<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIERTTWO03038_000_121<tab>We'll carry the scrap back to Castellum Velodyna. You can go ahead and wait with Gales and the others.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIERTTWO03038_000_121細かくなった資材は、カステッルム・ベロジナまで運んでおく。
アンタは、「ゲイルス」さんのもとで待っていてくれ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_125<tab>This scrap metal must be broken into smaller pieces before it can be carried away. Ride the marid and use its Trample ability to prepare the raw materials for transport.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_125資源になりそうな鉄材だが、持ち運ぶには大きすぎるようだ……。
カステッルム・ベロジナの「ダクシャナ」に話しかけ、
マーリドに騎乗して「踏みつけ」を行わせよう。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_DAKSHINA_000_122<tab>Do you wish to ride the marid again?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_DAKSHINA_000_122シュー……マーリドに乗りたいと？
いいだろう……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIER03038_000_125<tab>J'olhmyn's explained the situation. We'll stay out of your way, so go ahead!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIER03038_000_125ジャ・オルミン副官から話は聞いてるぜ！
思い切りやっちまってくれ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIER03038_000_126<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIER03038_000_126<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIERTWO03038_000_126<tab>You get started. We'll deal with the scrap once you're done!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIERTWO03038_000_126アンタは、を細かく砕いてくれればいい。
関所まで運ぶのは、俺たちの仕事だ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_130<tab>You're back! Where's the scrap?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_130オウ、帰ったかァ！
いい感じの鉄材は集まったんだろうなァ、オオーン！？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_140<tab>It'll be here soon? I can't wait! I'll make the best chocobo stables you've ever bloody seen!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_140もうすぐここへ運ばれてくるんだなァ！？
っしゃオラァ、あとはオレに任せておけやコラァ！
漢（おとこ）ゲイルスが、最強のチョコボ留を造ってやらァ！！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_100_140<tab>But first, I'll get Alpa to make some beds! And if she buggers it up, I'll have her guts for garters!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_100_140っと、その前にィ……
猫娘が集めた木材を使って、蛇女に寝台を造らせてみたぜェ！！
早速、お披露目と行くぜ、オラァ！！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_141<tab>So, what do you think? Not bad, eh?
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_141見ろ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！！
こいつが、蛇女が造った寝台だァ！！
思ったよりも、良くできてんだろうがァ！？

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_142<tab>I made all the sheets myself too! Weaving is another ssspecialty of the Ananta, you know. Compared to the headdresses and clothing we usually make, this was sssimple!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_142しゅ～……何を隠そう、アナンタは、縫い物も得意なのじゃ！
普段から、自分が身につける頭巾や服などを作っておるゆえ、
かような作業ならお手の物でな！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_143<tab>To be honest, there's no point having a ssskill if you don't know what to do with it. That's why I'm glad Gales is here. I'd be lossst without his advice!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_143……じゃが、技術はあれど作る物がわからねば、何もできん。
ゲイルスが、ヒトにとって寝心地の良い寝台について、
教えてくれなければ、わらわひとりでは……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_144<tab>But I'm equally clueless when it comes to the Ananta! I've lived in Gyr Abania my whole life and I know next to nothing about them!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_144ハッ、このスカポンタンがァ！
オレたちだって、アナンタ族のことなんて何も知らねえっつーのォ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_145<tab>We may have our differences, but we share a common tongue. We can learn a lot from each other.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_145だがオレたちは、見た目は違ぇが、言葉は通じるだろがい。
なら、互いに理解し合えるまで、話し合ったらいいんじゃねえか。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_146<tab>Yesss, I think so too.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_146<tab>しゅ～……そうじゃな、感謝するぞ、ゲイルス。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_147<tab>You've really made a difference here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm sure I'll need your help when more people start passing through our gates.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_147それに、)) (( )) 02 /var>も。
わらわは、おぬしから多くのことを学んでおる。
これからも、頼りにしておるぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_148<tab>That reminds me─ I should try out one of the new beds!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_148しゅ～……
さて、早速、寝台の寝心地を試してみるとしよう！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_149<tab>When I first met Alpa and heard she was captain of the Velodyna Gatekeepers, I didn't know what to expect. It was worth the journey though.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_149アナンタ族が隊長さんだと聞いて、
どんな部隊かと思っていましたが……なかなか楽しい場所ですね。
ぐふふふふふ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_149<tab>(I'm glad he's calmed down a bit...)
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_149<tab>も、もとに戻った……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_150<tab>Ah! I guess it's not as sturdy as it looks...
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_000_150しゅわぁ～～～！
勢いをつけて乗ったら、思い切り腰を打ったのじゃ！！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_150<tab><sigh> I just hope her mother doesn't show up now...
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_100_150<tab>今、アイツの母上が視察に来ないことを祈るよ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_151<tab>After what happened to Goodblade, I thought I was finished. Alpa asking me to come here could be the fresh start I've been looking for.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GALES_000_151グッドブレードを帝国に壊されてしまってから、
職に困っていましたが、ここなら上手くやっていけそうです。
ぐふふふふふ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_152<tab>Guest rooms have been added to Castellum Velodyna.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_152<tab>カステッルム・ベロジナの「簡易宿泊所」が改築されました！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_153<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Respected<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Vira.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_153「アナンタ族：アルパ国境警備隊」との友好関係が、
「敬意」になりました。
関所の発展に力を貸したことで、尊敬を集めたようです。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_154<tab>New Vira beast tribe daily quests are now available from Eshana at Castellum Velodyna.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_154これ以降、カステッルム・ベロジナにいる「エシャナ」より、
新たな「蛮族デイリークエスト」を受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_155<tab>Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Eshana as a reputation bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for beast tribe quests.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_155なお、友好ランクが上がった当日に限り、
「エシャナ」から受注できるデイリークエストの数が、
ボーナスとして、3つ追加されています。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_156<tab>These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Eshana. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_156友好ランクが上がる前に発行されたデイリークエストを、
すべて受注するとボーナス分が発行され、
受注権のある限り、これを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_157<tab>You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Madhura.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_SYSTEM_000_157また、「マドゥラ」より、
「友好関係：敬意」の商品を購入できるようになりました。
今後の冒険に役立てましょう！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_100_151<tab>I think you'll be pleasantly sssurprised!
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_ALPA_100_151<tab>しゅしゅしゅ……惚れ惚れする出来じゃ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_160<tab>Hopefully the wood I brought was up to snuff.
target: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_JOLHMYN_000_160<tab>早速、オレが集めた木材が役に立ったみたいだねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIER03038_000_165<tab>I always knew marids were strong but I've never seen anything like that before!
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIER03038_000_165ヒュゥ～！
マーリドの踏みつけは、相変わらず、すげえ破壊力だぜ！

source: TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIERTWO03038_000_170<tab>Let us handle this. I think Gales and the others could use your help.
target:
TEXT_BANANA003_03038_GUARDSOLDIERTWO03038_000_170細かくなった資材は、カステッルム・ベロジナまで運んでおく。
アンタは、「ゲイルス」さんのもとで待っていてくれ。
